Description.Text: The White Myth Hotel boasts a convenient location with modern amenities in every guestroom and superb service. The guestrooms are equipped with air conditioning, television, shower, balcony/terrace. The amenities and services offered at this Mykonos accommodation include shops, business center. These top-class facilities are complemented to excellent services to meet the needs of visitors to Mykonos.
With its central location, White Myth Hotel is within easy reach of most tourist attractions and business addresses in Mykonos.
